Media Advisory from 

This Media Advisory was pulled from News.gc.ca

MP Kerr to Participate in Grand Opening of Annapolis Royal Wharf

July 18, 2014 - ANNAPOLIS ROYAL, NS - Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency

Members of the media are invited to attend the grand re-opening of the upgraded Annapolis Royal Wharf where Greg Kerr, Member of Parliament for West Nova, on behalf of the Honourable Rob Moore, Minister of State (ACOA), will participate in community celebrations.

Date:
July 19, 2014
Time:
11:00
Location:
Annapolis Royal Wharf
St. George Street
Annapolis Royal, NS

-30-

Contacts

Alex Smith
Director, Communications and Outreach
Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency
902-426- 9417
Alex.Smith@acoa-apeca.gc.ca

Date modified:
2014-07-22
